entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 12:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
